name: empx_execute_swap
description: Execute an optimal token swap on an EVM-compatible blockchain. Requires a pre-computed Trade struct which can be obtained via empx_best_path or empx_gas_aware_route simulating skills. IF the trade involves bridging to or from a native token (ETH, PLS), you MUST construct the execution using the function explicitly defined in the chain's JSON mapping under `native_swap_from_func` or `native_swap_to_func`.

chain_id.description: Chain ID for the target blockchain.

max_steps.description: Maximum number of routing hops (up to 4).

gas_price.description: Gas price to be used for the transaction.

amount_out.description: The exact output amount returned from the swap.

adapters.description: Adapters used for the route hops.
